apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: APIManagerBackupSpec defines the desired state of APIManagerBackup

persistentVolumeClaim.description: PersistentVolumeClaim as backup data destination configuration

resources.description: Resources configuration for the backup data PersistentVolumeClaim. Ignored when VolumeName field is set

requests.description: Storage Resource requests to be used on the PersistentVolumeClaim. To learn more about resource requests see: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/manage-resources-containers/

storageClass.description: Storage class to be used by the PersistentVolumeClaim. Ignored when VolumeName field is set

volumeName.description: Name of an existing PersistentVolume to be bound to the backup data PersistentVolumeClaim

status.description: APIManagerBackupStatus defines the observed state of APIManagerBackup

apiManagerSourceName.description: Name of the APIManager from which the backup has been performed

backupPersistentVolumeClaimName.description: Name of the backup data PersistentVolumeClaim. Only set when PersistentVolumeClaim is used as the backup data destination

completed.description: Set to true when backup has been completed

completionTime.description: Backup completion time. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

mainStepsCompleted.description: Set to true when main steps have been completed. At this point backup still cannot be considered  fully completed due to some remaining post-backup tasks are pending (cleanup, ...)

startTime.description: Backup start time. It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.
